alert.note: Alert for Washington (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued November 16 at 1:06PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... Maryland Department of the Environment has issued a Code Orange Air Quality Action Day for Fine Particulates for the Hagerstown Region until midnight EST tonight. An Air Quality Action Day means that fine particular concentrations within the region may approach or exceed unhealthy standards. For additional information, please visit the Maryland Department of the Environment at: www.mde.maryland.gov/programs/air/AirQualityMonitoring/Pages/ index.aspxalertCTAsDict
